pages.title: Amaranth
pages.text: Though seemingly left behind for quite some time now, these seeds still look very much alive. You wonder what comes out of it when grown?

pages.title: Amaranth Grains
pages.text: You never have seen anything like it. Such an intense red. So expressive!\These Bushels can be crushed to get more grains.\\They can also be planted decoratively on grass or in a flower pot.

pages.title: Honey Pastry
pages.text: The taste of Amaranth is as different from Wheat as its appearance. In your mind sprouted completely new ideas, like this deliciousness here.

pages.title: Scones
pages.text: Small but fine pastry filled with cream.\\_Perfect with tea._

pages.title: Triple Meat Pot Pie
pages.text: This feast is guaranteed to fill your belly for quite some time.\\_Full of fat and meat and wine and warp!_
